title: Sept 2022-Gorgeous Brighton 1 bed. New Renovation! Half Fee
posting_body: Great deal on this one-bedroom on Sutherland Road in Brighton, just steps to the B Line.
Includes heat and hot water, hardwood floors, updated tiled kitchen, large living room, full tiled bath, plenty of closet space, and apartment is cable/Internet-ready.
Perfect for graduate students, working professionals, or a couple.
Call East Coast Realty for more information and a showing at 617-739-2211.
Incredible location for this newly renovated property featuring 1 and 2 bedroom apartment homes.
Apts have hardwood floors, high ceilings, great closet space, gorgeous kitchens and a porch!
PLEASE RESPOND WITH YOUR ACTUAL EMAIL ADDRESS OR PHONE NUMBER TO ENSURE YOU RECEIVE MY RESPONSE!
Call Aidan at 201-449-4090 or respond with your name, phone number, and email for further information or to schedule a showing!
